description.@en: Should you waiver or fail in your duty, you will carry the weight of the Blood Oath until it sees its end... or yours.

effect.@en:
Whenever you enact a Blood Oath, you are considered to be under the effects of Vow of Fealty (as outlined under Generalist Magick from the Grimoire
    chapter in ZWEIHAÌˆNDER).
